name: Unidentified_scrumrat
content: A human male scrumrat was a member of the White Worms criminal organization on the planet Corellia during the reign of the Galactic Empire. At some point the scrumrat was ganged up on by older scrumrats for reasons unknown to Qi'ra, who was also a scrumrat at the time alongside Han. Han stepped in to save the boy and instead got himself nearly killed until goons of Lady Proxima, the leader of the White Worms, intervened. Between 3 ABY and 4 ABY, Qi'ra, now the leader of Crimson Dawn, told Princess Leia Organa about the incident when the two met aboard the Millennium Falcon. In 4 ABY, Organa told Solo, now her husband, about the meeting with Qi'ra and that she had told Organa about the time Solo had saved the boy. After this, Solo briefly remembered the incident.
